member.name: M:FlowerStoreAPI.Controllers.ClientsController.GetAllClients
member.summary: This GET-request gives you a list of all the clients of the flower store.

member.name: M:FlowerStoreAPI.Controllers.OrdersController.GetAllOrders
member.summary: This GET-request gives you a list of all the orders of the flower store.

member.name: M:FlowerStoreAPI.Controllers.OrdersController.GetOrderById(System.Int32)
member.summary: This GET-request gives you the order that corresponds to the requested Id.
